name: dead zone (3DFPS)
description:
My 3DFPS Project made  with Unity 

Modifications are as follows  

  • Made 3 different levels with Unique environment and Difficulty
  • Added number of Assets  which makes level unique
  • Added a different Music track (for Horror effect)
  • Modified the Game UI Menu
  • Added Different Button Sprite
